column.name: description
column.value: Testing of drug in non-human subjects, to gather efficacy, toxicity and pharmacokinetic information

column.name: description
column.value: Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics particularly oral bioavailability and half-life of the drug

column.name: description
column.value: Testing of drug on healthy volunteers for dose-ranging

column.name: description
column.value: Testing of drug on patients to assess efficacy and safety

column.name: description
column.value: Proof of concept study or pilot study designed to demonstrate clinical efficacy or biological activity

column.name: description
column.value: Definite dose-finding study, finding the optimum dose at which the drug shows biological activity with minimal side-effects

column.name: description
column.value: Testing of drug on patients to assess efficacy, effectiveness and safety

column.name: description
column.value: Postmarketing surveillance – watching drug use in public

column.name: description
column.value: Clinical trial not funded by pharmaceutical or biotechnology company for commercial ends but by public-good agencies (usually universities or medical trusts) to advance medicine

column.name: description
column.value: Clinical trial funded by pharmaceutical or biotechnology company for commercial ends

column.name: description
column.value: Clinical Research Monitor, Clinical Research Associate (CRA)

column.name: description
column.value: Relevant clinical trial and research experience

column.name: description
column.value: Documentation of GCP and other trainings

column.name: description
column.value: Organisation responsible for biometry and statistics

column.name: description
column.value: Are there biospeciment samples collected in a study

column.name: description
column.value: Are there DICOM data collected in a study

column.name: description
column.value: Is there internal cooperation with other clinics in the house

column.name: description
column.value: World Health Organisation Universal Trial Number

column.name: description
column.value: Letzte Studienvisite beim zuletzt eingeschlossenen Patienten

column.name: description
column.value: Can open and login into EDC system

column.name: description
column.value: Can enroll patients and schedule events

column.name: description
column.value: Can search PID according to IDAT or PID
